artist: Artist: Kevin Scalzo; Publisher: Busybody Books , Northampton, Mass.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, illustration of a bear-like figure and two children playing together on top of unblossomed flowers, against a yellow sky/background; 26 pp.
title: Sugar Booger, No. 2
